summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to data processing; transferring from the Executive Department-Office of Management and Budget/Management Information Services to the Department of Administrative Services responsibility for managing the City's Electronic Data Processing Center and for the planning and coordination of automated data processing services for the City; providing for the succession of authority; amending Section 5 of Ordinance 105296 and repealing Section 1 thereof; and repealing Ordinance 98511.
